name: Dino-D
description:
The peculiarity of the game is that you need to control 2m¤ characters at once, you can also play together, each character has its own abilities, - a blue dinosaur, for example, can make a double jump and can swim, a yellow dinosaur can crawl in narrow spaces and cling ts¤ behind the walls.
Using each other's abilities, you need to pick up the keys that will open the doors to the next level. The further you go, the harder and more intricate the puzzles with the advent of new mechanics.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics by 8bitReactor
- Nice soundtrack by 8bitReactor
